'''Saltatio Favillae''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[Islands of the Lost and Forgotten]]''.

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* "Saltatio" in Latin refers to the act of dancing or a dance.<ref>Wiktionary: [https://en.m.wiktionary.org/wiki/saltatio Saltatio]</ref> On the other hand, "Favillae" is an inflection of the Latin "favilla," referring to smoke, ash, or burning.<ref>Wiktionary: [https://en.m.wiktionary.org/wiki/favilla Favillae]</ref>
** When put together, the title may mean "dance of ashes."
